dublin_core.dcvalue: Peek Vision is a mobile based application and clip on hardware that transforms low-cost Android smartphones into an eye examination and diagnostic suite that is capable of running a variety of eye tests. Integration with Google Maps allows for patient follow-up and treatment.
Dr. Andrew Bastawrous, Peek Vision, Email: andrew@peekvision.org | Dr. Andrew Cooper, Queen Elizabeth Diamond Jubilee Trust, Email: andrew.cooper@qejuileetrust.org
The Queen Elizabeth Diamond Jubilee Trust
Sensors and point-of Care Diagnostics, data collection and reporting, Non-communicable diseases
